To get your API Key:

1. Go to your Lemon Squeezy dashboard
2. Navigate to Settings » API
3. Create a new API key
4. Copy the API key and paste it here

Triggers when a subscription's payment collection is resumed after being previously paused

Triggers when a subscription renewal pay: Triggers when a subscription renewal payment fails
Triggers when a subscription has a succe: Triggers when a subscription has a successful payment after a failed payment
Triggers when a subscription payment is: Triggers when a subscription payment is refunded
